JOB DESCRIPTION:
To provide systems design, development, programming, consultation and support for next generation core banking application based in C# and .NET 4.0,relational databases and distributed n-tier application platforms. 
Desired Candidate Profile  

-Have developed Windows Application / Windows Service on Dotnet environment.  
-Working knowledge on RDBMS SQL Server / Oracle  
-Worked on .NET 3.5 & above.  
-Knowledge on Multithreading.  Skills required: C#, ASP.Net, Winforms/Windows Applications, Web Services, SQL Server
